EmailTemplate.name: Website outage mailer.Email - Whitepaper download
EmailTemplate.subject: We’re sorry you had a problem downloading a VMTurbo paper or report
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
Thank you for your recent inquiry. We experienced website issues in the earlier part of this week that may have prevented you from successfully downloading a VMTurbo white paper or report. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused you.
If you were affected by the outage, please see the links to our collateral below.
- Sizing Up IT Operations Management <http://www.vmturbo.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/04/VMTurbo-Control-System-Overview-Dec-2012.pdf> - Successfully Virtualizing Business-Critical Applications <http://www.vmturbo.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/04/VMT-WP-Successfully-Virtualizing-Business-Critical-Applications-Dec-2012.pdf> - Utilizing Automation and Control to Improve TCO in Cloud Infrastructure <http://www.vmturbo.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/04/VMT-WP-Utilizing-Automation-Control-to-Improve-TCO-in-Cloud-Infrastructure-Dec-2012.pdf> - Successfully Managing Performance and Capacity in Cloud Environments <http://www.vmturbo.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/04/VMT-WP-Successfully-Managing-Performance-Capacity-in-Cloud-Dec-2012.pdf> - An Improved Approach to Virtualization Management <http://www.vmturbo.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/04/VMT-WP-Improved-Approach-to-Virtualization-Management-Dec-2012.pdf> - Applying an Economic Model to IT Management <http://www.vmturbo.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/04/VMT-WP-Applying-an-Economic-Model-to-IT-Mgmt-Dec-2012.pdf> - Accelerating Virtualization Initiatives <http://www.vmturbo.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/04/VMT-WP-Accelerating-Virtualization-Initiatives-Dec-2012.pdf> - Increasing Virtualization Benefits and Data Center Health <http://www.vmturbo.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/04/Techtarget-FAQ_Virtualization-Benefits.pdf> - Purchase Considerations for Virtualization Management <http://www.vmturbo.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/04/VMT-WP-Purchase-Considerations-for-Virtualization-Management-Dec-2012.pdf>
We look forward to working with you regarding your next steps in exploring VMTurbo’s control system for virtual infrastructure that ensures consistent service delivery and reduces the capital and operational costs of running virtual data centers. Best regards,
{{lead.Lead Owner First Name:default=The VMTurbo Team}} {{lead.Lead Owner Last Name:default=edit me}}
Email: {{lead.Lead Owner Email Address:default=sales@vmturbo.com}} Phone: {{lead.Lead Owner Phone Number:default=(781) 373-3540}}
